C

canAccess(User) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Document.Document
Verifies if the requesting User has permissions to access this Document.
CDAManager - Class in it.azraelsec.Chat
The CDAManager class is a Chat Dynamic Address Manager and its task is to dynamically generate and assign multicast IPv4 addresses when the Server needs it.
CDAManager() - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Chat.CDAManager
Initializes the ChatMessage internal ConcurrentHashMap
ChatMessage - Class in it.azraelsec.Chat
The ChatMessage class represents a multicast chat message sent from MessageSender or received by MessageReceiver.
ChatMessage(String, String) - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Chat.ChatMessage
It stores the data the message contains and initializes the timestamp.
ChatMessage(String, String, long) - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Chat.ChatMessage
It stores the data the message contains.
checkRemove(Document) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.CDAManager
Checks if the Document in argument exists within the assigned addresses' list and, in this case, it removes it.
clearNotificationList() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Notification.NotificationClientThread
Clears the notifications queue.
Client - Class in it.azraelsec.Client
The Client class represents the TURING Client execution and provides all the methods which allows the user to interact with the Server.
Client() - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Client.Client
Initializes NotificationClientThread, MessageReceiver and LocalSession objects.
close() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Notification.NotificationServerThread
Imposes the NotificationServerThread to shutdown.
Commands - Enum in it.azraelsec.Protocol
The Commands enumeration encapsulates all the commands that Client and Server will exchange between them via their main TCP connection.
Communication - Class in it.azraelsec.Protocol
The Communication class encapsulates all the logic related to the communication protocol used to exchange commands and their execution results in a solid way.
Communication() - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
 
compareTo(ChatMessage) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.ChatMessage
Makes two ChatMessages (horribly) comparable based on the timestamp value.
create() - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageSender
It allocate a new MessageSender object, initializes the UDP channel and sets multicast interface.
createNewDocument(String, int, String, User) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Document.DocumentsDatabase
Creates a new Document adding it directly to the DocumentsDatabase.
